attributes.action: make representations to the Royal Mint in order to keep the figure of Britannia on the reverse of a 50p coin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britannia has been on British coinage uninterrupted for the last 300 years.  She is a symbol of all that is great about British culture & society.  There is mounting speculation that the Royal Mint will axe Britannia in the redesign of currency.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
